member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Analyzers.FixAnalyzers.CSharpFixerWithFixAllAnalyzer
member.summary: A that intends to support fix all occurrences must classify the registered code actions into equivalence classes by assigning it an explicit, non-null equivalence key which is unique across all registered code actions by this fixer. This enables the to fix all diagnostics in the required scope by applying code actions from this fixer that are in the equivalence class of the trigger code action. This analyzer catches violations of this requirement in the code actions registered by a fixer that supports .
